casebody.data:
LeFloris LYON, petitioner,
v.
WISE CARTER CHILD AND CARAWAY, P.A., et al.; LeFloris Lyon, petitioner,
v.
Wise Carter Child and Caraway, P.A., et al.; and LeFloris Lyon, petitioner,
v.
Wise Carter Child and Caraway, P.A., et al. No. 14M105. Supreme Court of the United States April 20, 2015.

Opinion

Motion for leave to file a petition for writ of certiorari with the supplemental appendix under seal granted.
